About

The kind of vibe, product and service that we offer here at The Godfather Barber is something that we've fine-tuned in just under two years (est. 2013) and something which, until we set up shop, was missing in the Wellington region. We are very particular when it comes to where we source our products, who we do business with and how we operate. Loyalty, respect and sharp cuts are the values that we inspire in our clients and demand of ourselves.

Prices

Haircuts

  • Single clipper $20
  • Multi clipper $22
  • Scissor cut $35
  • Kids (under 6) $20
  • Kids (6-15) $25

Beards

  • Full beard $10
  • Beard style $16
  • Cut throat shave $60

The crew

Danny

'dallas'

Formerly of Dr Folicles, Melbourne Australia - Danny has been a Barber/Hairdresser for 12 years. Moonlighting in the fashion industry, taking part in various fashion weeks before deciding to be full time in the barbering industry. Londoner at heart, Danny is your man when it comes to scissor cuts and sharp restyled. This man knows his way around a barber chair and more importantly, a bar.

Rod

'godfather'

Owner, operator and all round crazy bastard Rodrigo Ballaminut hailing from SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil, has 19 years of experience in this industry and shows no sign of stopping. Before Coming to good Ol' NZ Rod has worked in Japan and Brazil before resting in Wellington (citizen of 8 years) and starting his own business. The one and only, Godfather of Dixon street.

Alex

'ranga'

While Wellington is his home, Alex has travelled a fair bit in his 20 years. Not much can be said about Alex, other than he's 20, he's ginger and cuts a mean fade. Fresh into the Barber scene, born and bred kiwi and natural dirty bugger. Go the kiwis.
